column4: i'm not sure i follow, there is some /etc/resolvconf/ dir with some avahi thing in it, but /etc/resolv.conf is still the right file, unless I'm missing something.
you made me realize that the person over the phone might have missed the dot
debsums is a program that compares installed files against their md5sums at the time of install. It might be able to show you libs that are broken. (i'm not clear on your issue exactly though)
